content.rendered:
PRODUCTS

KNIT PRODUCTS

MENSWEAR
WOMENSWEAR
KIDSWEAR

MENSWEAR

Shirkets, Basic t-shirts, hoodies, joggers, bombers, sweatshirts, tanks, shorts are just few of the garments that Fakir Apparels is geared up for. Manufacturing menswear from the year from inception, the company is well equipped to make outfits which not only look nice but are also very functional. “Total Customer Satisfaction” achieved through “Total Quality Control”. In house printing, wash and embroidery facility allows us to make any desired designs. Acid washes, CPD, pigments dye along with appliqués on the best quality fabric results in hot selling garments.

WOMENSWEAR

Dresses, jumpsuits, t-shirts, tanks, camisoles, sweat dresses, shorts, leggings, sweatshirts all are expertly managed by our fully skilled team. Having in house printing and embroidery facility enables us to make the latest designs for womenswear. Frills, gathers, pintucks, lace attachment etc. embellishments are skillfully dealt with to make the most beautiful collection. Making womenswear from 1998, we have enough experience to make any variation that may be desired in this category. Dedicated pattern makers work closely with your designers to make the desired collection. Over 18 years of experience means that the desired shape variations can be easily managed, the prints can be explored and new versions created.

KIDSWEAR

Onesies, kid’s jumpsuits, t-shirt sets, shorts, hoodies, sweatshirts, capes are manufactured at our factory. Covering sizes from preemies to pre-teens we have been equipped to handle kid’s wear from the year 1998. The garments manufactured are of best quality so that the consumer may get the best value from the product. At Fakir Apparels we ensure that kids wear garments meet all the international quality parameters. Special care is taken for fabric hand feel and garment safety so that the tiny bodies can grow and explore their world, safely. 100% products that leave our factory are of the best quality level not only for the garments but even for the packaging. Foil, pigments, photo prints, pigment print stone attachments, embroidery are all done in house giving us total control on the parameters set by our buyers.

WOVEN & OUTERWEAR PRODUCTS

MENSWEAR
WOMENSWEAR
KIDSWEAR

MENSWEAR

The Outerwear & Outdoor Technical Performance Apparel collection for men comprises the products range suitable for all environments. The segment includes Padded and Non-Padded Real Down Jackets, Fake Down Jackets, Trench Coats, Long and Short Fashion Jackets, Seam Sealed Jackets & Rain Protector, Cycling Jackets, Ski Pants, Ski Jackets, Ski Over-all etc.
Woven casuals and active wear range covers Denims, Washed and Unwashed Trousers and Cargos Pants, performance Shorts, Jeggings, Joggers, Jackets.

WOMENSWEAR

Women collection comprises the wide products range of Outerwear and Technical Apparels for outdoor requirements. This consists of Padded, Non-Padded Real Down Jackets, Fake Down Jackets, Trench Coats, Parkas, Long and Short Fashion Jackets, Seam Sealed Jackets & Rain Protector, Cycling jackets, Ski Pants, Ski Jackets, Ski Over-all etc.
Woven casual range incorporates casual Blouses, Shirts, Denim tops as well it balances with Denims, Washed and Unwashed Trousers, Cargos Pants and active wear Performance Shorts, Jeggings, Joggers.

KIDSWEAR

The Kids wear sections includes the Outerwear & technical apparels for active wear, sports, outdoor requirements. The line covers of Padded, Non-Padded Real Down Jackets, Fake Down Jackets, Seam Sealed Jackets & Rain Protector, Ski Pants, Ski Jackets, Ski Over-all etc.
The Kids wear line also covers trendy range of woven casual Denims jackets and bottoms Cargos Pants, Shorts, Over-all.
